org.slf4j.profiler

Class StopWatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.slf4j.profiler.StopWatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimeInstrument

    public class StopWatch
extends Object
implements TimeInstrument
    A very basic TimeInstrument which can be started and stopped once and only once.
    Author:
    Ceki Gülcü
